name: Fight those Fats!
description:
Control nanobots within an artery to fight fats on their level! 

Click on a nanobot to select it, then click  on a fatty substance to secure it's destruction! 

Can you keep the artery from blocking? Or is this poor person destined for disaster? 
Alternatively, don't fight the fats and see how blood clots can occur! 

(This game does not currently have an end condition due to time restraints, so just press escape to close when you've finished) 

Created by: 

Chelsea Dainton 
Jason Mallett
Patrick Florczak 
Tristan Jacobs

Music & Sound - Downloaded from Freesound.org 
(created by users thef1like, projectsUO12 and Innominatus)
